long_description: The signature wrap frame from Spy, Dirk Polarized Sunglasses are built from virtually indestructible Grilamid nylon with shatter-resistant polycarbonate lenses. Gray polarized lenses cut glare, block 89% of visible light and block 100% of harmful UV rays. Spy polycarbonate lenses are injected in a unique tapered shape to provide optically correct, distortion-free viewing at all angles. Grilamid nylon frames stand up to UV exposure and extreme temperatures, and are resistant to impact and stress cracking.
short_description: The signature wrap frame from Spy, Dirk Polarized Sunglasses are built from virtually indestructible Grilamid nylon with shatter-resistant polycarbonate lenses.
